chapter_description.p: The WebTools module provides functions to interact with web resources, transfer data via URLs, and work with RESTful web services.

keyword.name: urlencode
keyword.description: Replace special characters in URLs with escape characters.

keyword.name: weboptions
keyword.description: Specify parameters for RESTful web service

keyword.name: webread
keyword.description: Read data from RESTful web service to Nelson's variable

keyword.name: websave
keyword.description: Save data from RESTful web service to file

keyword.name: webwrite
keyword.description: Write data to RESTful web service
